reviewText: Its a great anime but it doesn't have any option for subtitles and/or changing the language to English
Before i buy it i want to know if it has english subtitles

Got my dvd on time and in good condition. Had to take some stars off when I realized it was a region 2 dvd. That information should have been in the product details. Now if I want to watch it, I will have to purchase or rent a region free dvd player.
